attributes.action: School Uniform Should Not Be Mandatory as it causes more distractions!
attributes.additional_details: I have spoken to many people about this and they always say “I was wearing tights and they just ripped so I decided to change and I was sent home”. Also a male friend said “my school shirt ripped and I had nothing else other than my PE top so I had no choice”
attributes.background: Schools in the uk are meant to wear uniform yet it costs more than regular clothing items, causes many more distractions.
